title: Automation - The Car Company Tycoon Game

gpu: X.Org Radeon RX 580 Series (POLARIS10, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.7-1-default, LLVM 6.0.1)
notes: The game works out of the box when you select "Play Automation - UE4 No Options Menu" when starting the game. After a quick 90 minute session with the game I haven't noticed any bugs or crashes. The BeamNG Drive exporter wasn't tested.
